Package model.item.animal

Class ConcreteAnimal

java.lang.Object
model.item.Item
model.item.animal.AnimalAbstract
model.item.animal.ConcreteAnimal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<Item>, AnimalInterface, ItemInterface
public class ConcreteAnimal extends AnimalAbstract
This class represents a concrete implementation of an Animal in the system. It extends the AnimalAbstract class, inheriting its fields and methods. Each concrete animal can be of a specific type (e.g., Cow, Pig, Goat, Chicken), and has associated attributes like price, status, number, maxNumber, and typeProduct.

  • Constructor Details

    • ConcreteAnimal

      public ConcreteAnimal(ItemType.Animals type) throws CustomExceptions.NoAnimalFoundException, CustomExceptions.NoProductFoundException
      Constructs a new instance of a specific type of Animal.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the Animal to be created (e.g., Cow, Pig, Goat, Chicken).
      Throws:
      CustomExceptions.NoAnimalFoundException - if the provided type does not match any known Animal types.
      CustomExceptions.NoProductFoundException - if the product associated with the Animal type cannot be found.
